briefTitle: Clobetasol Propionate 0.05% Shampoo in Association With Antifungal Shampoo in Scalp Seborrheic Dermatitis

armGroups.label: C propionate 4/week + Ketoconasole 2/week
interventionNames: Drug: clobetasol propionate shampoo (4/week) - ketoconazole shampoo (2/week)

armGroups.label: C propionate 2/week + Ketoconasole 2/week
interventionNames: Drug: clobetasol propionate shampoo (2/week) - ketoconazole shampoo (2/week)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with moderate to severe scalp Seborrheic Dermatitis

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects suffering from psoriasis,
* Subjects with a known allergy to one of the components of the test products,
* Female subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy during the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Severity Score (TSS): Percent Change From Baseline at Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: Total Severity Score (TSS) is sum of erythema, scaling and pruritus severity scores of the lesions evaluated each on a 4-point scale from 0 = None to 3 = Severe by the investigator. So minimum TSS can be 0 and maximum 9.
